text: TataÊ»at Tuhan teuma that leupah TataÊ»at rasul teuma pih meunan Sabab droeneuh nyan utosan Allah Bek tameubantah sabe keudroe-droe Gata jeut rugoe hana phaedah Nan gata nyang got pih gadoh keudroe Mey gata laloe meubantah-bantah Teuma tasaba le bandum gata Mangat jeut gata sajan ngon Allah Allah cit sajan ngon ureueng takwa
